content.html: Hey @SlackHQ I have a feature request. Can I get a notifier like here/ channel but for every1 who logged into the office so I can notify everyone in the office? Or to make it more generic a feature to log into a place (like status) and a @ operator for those logged into the place
content.value: Hey @SlackHQ I have a feature request. Can I get a notifier like here/ channel but for every1 who logged into the office so I can notify everyone in the office? Or to make it more generic a feature to log into a place (like status) and a @ operator for those logged into the place
